verses.verse: <S%H430>God,<s%> why have you <S%H2186>rejected<s%> us <S%H5331>forever?<s%> Why does your <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H6225>smolder<s%> against the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of your <S%H4830>pasture?<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> your <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> which you <S%H7069>purchased<s%> of <S%H6924>old,<s%> <S%H7626>which<s%> you have <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> to be the tribe of your <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> in which you have <S%H7931>lived.<s%>
Lift <S%H7311>up<s%> your <S%H6471>feet<s%> to the <S%H5331>perpetual<s%> <S%H4876>ruins,<s%> all the <S%H7489>evil<s%> that the <S%H341>enemy<s%> has done in the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>
Your <S%H6887>adversaries<s%> have <S%H7580>roared<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of your <S%H4150>assembly.<s%> They have set <S%H7760>up<s%> their <S%H226>standards<s%> as <S%H226>signs.<s%>
They <S%H3045>behaved<s%> like men <S%H935>wielding<s%> <S%H7134>axes,<s%> cutting through a <S%H5442>thicket<s%> of <S%H6086>trees.<s%>
<S%H3162>Now<s%> they break all its carved <S%H6603>work<s%> <S%H1986>down<s%> with <S%H3781>hatchet<s%> and <S%H3597>hammers.<s%>
They <S%H7971>have<s%> <S%H784>burned<s%> your <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%> They have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the dwelling <S%H4908>place<s%> of your <S%H8034>Name.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> "We will <S%H3238>crush<s%> them <S%H3162>completely.<s%>" They have burned <S%H8313>up<s%> all the <S%H4150>places<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> where God was <S%H410>worshiped.<s%>
We <S%H7200>see<s%> no miraculous <S%H226>signs.<s%> There is no longer any <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> neither is there among us anyone who <S%H3045>knows<s%> how <S%H5704>long.<s%>
How <S%H430>long,<s%> God, shall the <S%H6862>adversary<s%> <S%H2778>reproach?<s%> Shall the <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H5006>blaspheme<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5331>forever?<s%>
Why do you <S%H7725>draw<s%> back your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> even your right <S%H3027>hand?<s%> <S%H3615>Take<s%> it out <S%H7130>of<s%> your pocket and consume <S%H2436>them!<s%>
Yet <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H6924>old,<s%> <S%H6466>working<s%> <S%H3444>salvation<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
You <S%H6565>divided<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> by your <S%H5797>strength.<s%> You <S%H7665>broke<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the sea <S%H8577>monsters<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
You <S%H7533>broke<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H3882>Leviathan<s%> in <S%H5414>pieces.<s%> You gave him as <S%H3978>food<s%> to <S%H5971>people<s%> and desert <S%H6728>creatures.<s%>
You <S%H1234>opened<s%> up <S%H4599>spring<s%> and <S%H5158>stream.<s%> You dried <S%H3001>up<s%> <S%H386>mighty<s%> <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>
The <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H3915>yours,<s%> the night is also <S%H3559>yours.<s%> You have prepared the <S%H3974>light<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>
You have <S%H5324>set<s%> all the <S%H1367>boundaries<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> You have <S%H3335>made<s%> <S%H7019>summer<s%> and <S%H2779>winter.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H341>this,<s%> that the enemy has <S%H2778>mocked<s%> <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh. <S%H5036>Foolish<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H5006>blasphemed<s%> your <S%H8034>name.<s%>
<S%H5414>Don't<s%> deliver the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of your <S%H8449>dove<s%> to wild <S%H2416>beasts.<s%> <S%H7911>Don't<s%> forget the <S%H2416>life<s%> of your <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H5331>forever.<s%>
<S%H5027>Honor<s%> your <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> for <S%H4285>haunts<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%> fill the <S%H4285>dark<s%> <S%H4999>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H1790>Don't<s%> let the oppressed <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H3637>ashamed.<s%> Let the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> your <S%H8034>name.<s%>
<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H430>God!<s%> <S%H7378>Plead<s%> your own <S%H7379>cause.<s%> <S%H2142>Remember<s%> how the foolish <S%H5036>man<s%> <S%H2781>mocks<s%> you all <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H7911>Don't<s%> forget the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H6887>adversaries.<s%> The <S%H7588>tumult<s%> of those who rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against you <S%H5927>ascends<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>
